function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate estimation of people flows and occupancies","Impact":"Mismanagement of building occupancy leading to congestion or poor resource allocation","Mitigation":"Implement more accurate sensor technology and data validation processes","Technologies":"Kalman filter, improved sensor technology","People":"Building occupants, facility managers","Owner":"Building management, technology providers"},{"Description":"Error accumulation in sensor-only method","Impact":"Large bias in estimating people numbers, leading to inefficient resource allocation","Mitigation":"Implement Kalman filter algorithm to improve estimation accuracy","Technologies":"Kalman filter","People":"Building occupants, facility managers","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Lack of ground truth data for comparison","Impact":"Inability to validate the accuracy of the estimation results","Mitigation":"Utilize additional validation methods, such as camera recordings, to compare estimation results","Technologies":"Camera recordings, data validation processes","People":"Researchers, facility managers","Owner":"Research team, building management"}]}
